Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: VICTOR CASTRO
Reviews.Content: never saw a tablet or laptop so slow, the sound fails, you can not see a continuous video even though I have high speed WiFi, would return

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Greg Buck
Reviews.Content: I've not had a tablet before now so I really didn't know what to expect. So far it seems to be really cool. It'll take a little getting used to, but I like it very much so far.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the money!
Reviews.Author: john powlis jr.
Reviews.Content: This tablet I bought to hold him over until his birthday when I was going to get him a larger more known tablet. Since he got this unit he's very happy and doesn't talk about the "other" tablet at all. He thanked me several times for getting it and I'm thinking of getting a few more in case needed!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.1 Jelly Bean, 9 inches Display
All winner A4 1.6 GHz
64 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory
1 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Kocaso MID M9300WH 9-Inch 64 GB Tablet
